data.eml:eml: A partial revision of the genus Periclimenes Costa, 1884 (Crustacea: Decapoda: Palaemonidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Bruce, A. J. (2004): A partial revision of the genus Periclimenes Costa, 1884 (Crustacea: Decapoda: Palaemonidae). Zootaxa 582: 1-26, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.157391
